# AI Agent Instructions

This file provides context and guidelines for AI coding assistants working on the ManaSuite project.

## Guidelines

**Before working on code, read the appropriate coding standards:**

- **Working on API/Backend?** → Read `./Docs/CODING STANDARDS/PHP CODING STANDARDS.txt`
- **Working on iOS/macOS App?** → Read `./Docs/CODING STANDARDS/SWIFT 6 CODING STANDARDS.txt`

## Project Structure

- **API:** `./API/` - Server software (PHP, Laravel 12)
- **App:** `./App/`, `./Modules/`, `./Plugins/`, `./Libraries/` - iOS/iPadOS/macOS client (Swift 6)
